Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.CLI

Class DrawElements

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CLI.DrawElements
  • public class DrawElements
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods responsible for the aesthetic of the game and its appearance

      • drawBoard

        public static void drawBoard​(java.lang.String background,
                             java.lang.String mainColor)
        This method draws the Board
        Parameters:
        background - The color of the background
        mainColor - The color of the Square delimiters

      • drawBuilder

        public static void drawBuilder​(Coordinate coordinate,
                               java.lang.String backGround,
                               int player)
        A basic method that draws the builder on an assigned square
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate parameter
        backGround - The color of the background of the cell containing the symbol of the builder
        player - The number of the player owning the builder drawn (required to identify its color)

      • refreshBuilders

        public static void refreshBuilders​(java.util.List<Builder> builders,
                                   java.util.List<Player> players,
                                   boolean neighborhood)
        Given the board, this method draws exclusively the builders in the square
        Parameters:
        builders - The list of builders in the game
        players - The list of players in the game
        neighborhood - A boolean that specifies if the builder is on a highlighted square

      • drawSquare

        public static void drawSquare​(Square square,
                              java.util.List<Builder> builders,
                              java.util.List<Player> players,
                              boolean neighborhood)
        This method draws a square using the information from the board
        Parameters:
        square - The square parameter
        builders - The list of builders in the game
        players - The list of players in the game
        neighborhood - A boolean that specifies if the square should be highlighted as a neighborhood or not

      • refreshBoard

        public static void refreshBoard​(Board board,
                                java.util.List<Builder> builders,
                                java.util.List<Player> players,
                                java.lang.String activePlayer,
                                java.lang.String client)
        This method updates the whole board, square by square It also updates the Game Information panel
        Parameters:
        board - The current board
        builders - The list of builders present at the moment
        players - The list of players currently playing
        activePlayer - The player who is currently holding the turn
        client - The client from which this method is called

      • drawGameInfo

        public static void drawGameInfo​(java.util.List<Player> players,
                                java.lang.String activeplayer,
                                java.lang.String client)
        This Method draws the Game Information panel, which is the little box near the board that shows the info about the players
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players in the game
        activeplayer - The player who is holding the turn
        client - The player who is playing

      • writeGodInfo

        public static void writeGodInfo​(java.util.List<Player> players)
        This method writes the descriptions of the gods during the game
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players in the game

      • writeWinner

        public static void writeWinner​(java.util.List<Player> players,
                               Player winner,
                               java.lang.String client)
        This method writes the End Game Message (Victory or Defeat)
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players in the game
        winner - The player who has won the match
        client - The name of the player who calls this method

      • getPlayerColor

        public static java.lang.String getPlayerColor​(java.util.List<Player> players,
                                              Player currentplayer)
        This method extracts the correct color of the player
        Parameters:
        players - The list of players in the game
        currentplayer - The player parameter
        Returns:
        The String representing the color of the selected player
